CCTVVideoDownload
=================

**This cross-platform app was generated by** `Briefcase`_ **- part of**
`The BeeWare Project`_. **If you want to see more tools like Briefcase, please
consider** `becoming a financial member of BeeWare`_.

央视频下载器
用于下载央视网的视频，如今日说法awa
